thread.title: Mark Cerio

author: Mark Cerio
title: Mark Cerio
text: When I spoke with the sales lady everything went fine on that first day when the tech came and couldn't do my installation I tried calling it later in the day to find out if somebody was coming back I was put on hold several times nobody had an answer for me.. at one point they wanted me to wait another 7 days before somebody would come out ..the second time I called I was on the phone for 1 hour and 17 minutes just trying to find out if somebody was going to come by to install FiOS the next day after the failed attempt....that's kind of crappy an hour and 17 minutes that's terrible.
